input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to create glossy eyelids?
input_text.Response A:
Hello! 🐰👀 I can help you with that! 😊 To create glossy eyelids, you need to use some special products that will make your eyes look shiny and pretty. 💖

First, you need to use an eyelid primer. This will help your eyeshadow stay on your eyelids and look nice and smooth. 💪

Next, you can use a shimmery eyeshadow that will give your eyelids a sparkly look. You can apply it all over your eyelid or just on the center of your lid. 🌟

Then, you can use a liquid eyeliner to draw a line along your upper lash line. This will make your eyes look bigger and more open. 😍

Finally, you can use a clear mascara to make your lashes look longer and thicker. This will complete your glossy eyelid look! 💕

Remember to be gentle when applying these products, and don't use too much of them. Less is more, okay? 😉 Now, go ahead and try it out! You'll look so pretty and glossy! 💖
input_text.Response B:
Sure! Here are some steps you can follow to create glossy eyelids:

1. Start with a clean and moisturized eyelid.
2. Apply a primer all over the lid to create a smooth base.
3. Use a shimmery eyeshadow as a base color for your lids.
4. Use a darker eyeshadow to create a crease on your eyelid.
5. Use a liquid eyeliner to line your eyes and create a winged effect.
6. Apply a white eyeshadow on your inner corners to make your eyes look brighter.
7. Apply mascara to your lashes to make them look longer and fuller.
8. Lastly, use a highlighter on your brow bone to add a bit of shimmer.

And there you have it! Glossy eyelids in 8 easy steps.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
